mapper.select: SELECT prdt_cd, order_qty, prdt_stc, '10' as psaf_stc FROM order_d WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} AND prdt_cd = #{prdtCd}

SELECT a.prdt_cd, a.rsc_cd, (SELECT rsc_stc FROM rsc_stc WHERE rsc_cd = b.rsc_cd) rsc_stc, b.saf_stc FROM prdt_bom a, rsc b, order_d o WHERE a.rsc_cd = b.rsc_cd AND a.prdt_cd = o.prdt_cd and o.order_no = #{orderNo} order by prdt_cd

SELECT DISTINCT a.plan_no, TO_CHAR(a.plan_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') plan_dt, a.plan_nm FROM plan a LEFT JOIN plan_d b ON b.plan_no = a.plan_no JOIN order_d o ON o.order_no = b.order_no AND order_qty > indica_qty

SELECT DISTINCT o.order_no, TO_CHAR(o.recv_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') recv_dt, o.co_cd, o.prog_info, o.paprd_dt FROM order_tb o LEFT JOIN plan_d p ON p.order_no = o.order_no JOIN order_d od ON od.order_no = o.order_no WHERE o.prog_info != '종료' AND p.plan_no is null AND od.order_qty>od.indica_qty

SELECT B.order_deta_no, B.order_no, TO_CHAR(A.paprd_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') paprd_dt, TO_CHAR(A.recv_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') recv_dt, B.prdt_cd, (SELECT prdt_nm FROM prdt WHERE prdt_cd = B.prdt_cd) prdt_nm, B.order_qty, B.prdt_stc, '10' as day_out_put FROM order_tb A, order_d B WHERE A.order_no = B.order_no
AND B.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT * FROM co WHERE 1=1
AND co_cd like '%'||#{coCd}||'%'
AND co_nm like '%'||#{coNm}||'%'

SELECT * FROM prdt WHERE 1=1
AND prdt_cd like '%'||#{prdtCd}||'%'
AND prdt_nm like '%'||#{prdtNm}||'%'
ORDER BY prdt_cd asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (plan_no, plan_dt, plan_nm) VALUES( CREATENO('PLA', PLANSEQ.nextval), TO_DATE(#{planDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{planNm} )

SELECT nvl(max(plan_deta_no), 0)+1 from plan_d
INSERT INTO plan_d (plan_deta_no, plan_no, plan_dt, order_no, recv_dt, prdt_cd, plan_qty, wk_ord, wk_dt) VALUES( #{planDetaNo}, (SELECT nvl(max(plan_no),0) FROM PLAN), TO_DATE(#{planDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{orderNo}, TO_DATE(#{recvDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{prdtCd}, #{planQty}, #{wkOrd}, TO_DATE(#{wkDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') )
